title: Moved to Hong Kong for my first job
description: I moved across the Pacific Ocean to start my career as an actuarial consultant in Hong Kong. Early on in my career, I got a chance to speak with clients and asked effective questions to get to their core problems.

title: Moved to San Francisco for my second job
description: I moved to Mercer's San Francisco division. This was a more global role than my previous position in Hong Kong. I sharpened my project management skills by managing 10+ benefit renewals across 7 clients. Within my first few months, I was tasked to lead a data visualization product on HR data. This inspired me to continue my path on being a software engineer.

title: Completed Springboard's Data Science Bootcamp
description: I completed Springboard's Data Science Bootcamp. I used Python and SQL to analyze data while also building machine learning models to be more efficient with coding at my current role.

title: Moved back home
description: I moved back to Vancouver due to COVID-19 and to be closer to my family.

title: Became an Associate of the Society of Actuaries
description: I completed my qualification to become an Associate of the Society of Actuaries. I learnt various financial modelling techniques, risk management, and statistical models. As part of the curriculum, I also built machine learning models and interpreted the results of the models to a non-technical audience.

title: Promoted to Principal Consultant
description: Completed a major milestone in my career at Mercer - becoming a Principal. In my current role, I am the responsible for managing several rapidly growing high-tech companies with their global benefits programs. I mentor our junior team members and help themt think critically on how benefits strategies should align with a company's vision.
